productTabs.label: Details
productTabs.title: Box Making – Details & Features
productTabs.content:
This RSC carton is produced using industrial corrugation technology and is available in both single-wall and double-wall grades. We use high-quality kraft paper facings and water-based adhesive.

  • Design: Regular Slotted Container (RSC)
  • Seams: Hot melt or cold glue
  • Strength Testing: ECT, Burst test

productTabs.label: Shipping & MOQ
productTabs.title: Shipping & Minimum Order
productTabs.content: India-wide shipping available. MOQ starts from 50 units for custom-size boxes. Bulk orders are palletized for safe handling.

questions.q: Can you print our logo on the box?
questions.a: Yes — please upload your artwork during checkout.

questions.q: Do you provide the dieline template?
questions.a: Yes, we provide dieline templates after order confirmation.

reviews.name: Rajesh
reviews.comment: Delivered well packed. Good quality corrugation.

reviews.name: Sonia
reviews.comment: Kraft finish as requested. Looks premium.
